description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref: PA/19/02608 dated 31/03/2022 'Construction of a part-four and part-nine storey building comprising 32 x Class C3 residential dwellings, hard and soft landscaping works, security enhancements, and the re-opening of an existing under croft parking structure.' To amend the wording of the following conditions to exclude the erection of the new entrance pavilion over the stairs into the existing undercroft parking structure from pre-commencement and pre-superstructure works:  Condition 4A - Contaminated Land Scheme Condition 5 - Construction Environmental Management & Logistics Plan Condition 6 - Plant and Machinery Details Condition 8 - Affordable Housing Statement Condition 9 - Financial Contributions Scheme Condition 10 - Employment Obligations Scheme Condition 12 - Scheme of Highway Works Condition 14 - Piling Method Statement Condition 15A - Noise and Vibration Condition 16 - Secured by Design Details Condition 18 - Child Play Space Condition 19 - Landscaping Condition 22 - Japanese Knotweed Condition 23 - SUDS Condition 29 - Materials, Finishes and Detailing
site_name: Brunton Wharf Estate,  Salmon Lane, London,  E14
